snippet: Madonna and Guy Ritchie were the model of good post-divorce parenting at their son’s bar mitzvah. My husband, his ex-wife and I have not always been so mature.
abstract: Madonna and Guy Ritchie were the model of good post-divorce parenting at their son’s bar mitzvah. My husband, his ex-wife and I have not always been so mature.

headline.main: Madonna and Guy Ritchie Model a 'Good Divorce'
